author: Carmen Alvarez
comment: There are a couple of places I visit only occasionally, and I can never remember the door code.  This app will show a notification with the door code when I arrive.  I only wish I had a smart watch to take advantage of the feature of this app which shows the door code on the watch.
title: Useful

author: Aladin Q
comment: Smart idea for those not smart enough to remember codes, or simply because you have too many to recall.
title: Useful

author: Jonathan Kely Kosi Akuitse
comment: Nice little app with a lovely UI. At the end, I don't have much need for it but for some people, like the developer who's disabled, it may be really useful.
title: Lovely
